attributes.action: Do not introduce road pricing nationwide and do not channel the money into improving public transport and conditions for walking and cycling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal for road pricing is an unfair revenue raising scheme, motorists already pay far too much money in fuel taxation and road tax. We rely on our cars to allow us to travel to work and for our leisure,they are a lifeline for the majority, please do not listen to the anti car minority and the climate change scare mongerers.Minority pressure groups must be ignored and the majority listened to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
